document_data.name: ''War Hammer of Phasing''
document_data.mainbody: '''''War hammers of phasing''''' were enchanted one-handed [[warhammer]]s that were dangerous due to the magic and their sheer bone-crushing weight.
document_data.Descriotion: These warhammers appeared to be ordinary weapons made of [[steel]] with {{SI|18'|'"|long=yes}} hafts.
document_data.Powers: ''War hammers of phasing'' could be created with two enchantment strengths ''+2'' and ''+3''. Additionally, upon a successful strike, these hammers had a chance of dealing magical ''cold'' damage or ''phasing'' the targets for ten seconds. The phased targets received damage as long as the effects of the magic remained active.
document_data.History: [[1281 DR]], the leader of [[frost giant]]s of the [[Dorn's Deep|Wyrm's Tooth]] glacier on the [[Spine of the World]], [[Joril Frostbeard]] owned a ''warhammer of phasing'' of ''+2'' enchantment. During the same year, a blind [[dwarf|dwarven]] smith [[Tiernon Denthelm]] of the [[Gloomfrost]] ice caverns offered one of these hammers with a ''+3'' enchantment for purchase.
